name: Difficult life
description:
The year 2017 is considered the worst year for all Venezuelans. It is a well-remembered year because the crisis that the country was going through became so acute that we had to get up at 2 am, to stand in line and try to buy at least something, be it to eat, medicine, or anything. Apart from that there were riots everywhere, and the constant blackouts damaged the few appliances we had.

 And that is why a friend and I decided to make this game to show a little of how that terrible situation was lived and the things that some people had to do.

      Characteristic:

  - It is a game with a very simple gameplay.

  - with a good story.

  - Good graphics.

  - You will see part of the day to day of a Venezuelan family.

     Controls:

  WSDA: Move

  C: Bend

  Shift left: Run

E: To interact

 Credits:

 Alejandro Valera 

 Oliver  Hernández

Assets: 

Standard assets

All Sky free
